field.name: dp_url
field.description: The URL to your DeskPRO installation (without a trailing slash). You should include the /index.php part if you are not using URL rewriting. Examples: http://example.com/deskpro or http://deskpro.example.com/index.php
field.label: DeskPRO URL

field.name: dp_joomla_api_key
field.description: A secret key used to sign communications between DeskPRO and this Joomla instance. This must be the same secret you entered into DeskPRO at Admin / Integrate / Joomla.
field.label: Joomla Secret Key
